Cougaar 12.7

Uses of Package
org.cougaar.core.domain

Packages that use org.cougaar.core.domain
org.cougaar.core.domain This package contains the Cougaar DomainManager and LogicProvider interfaces. 
org.cougaar.core.mobility.ldm   
org.cougaar.core.relay This package contains the Cougaar support for "relays", which are generic blackboard objects that transfer data between agents. 
org.cougaar.core.service This package contains the Cougaar primary core service APIs. 
org.cougaar.planning.ldm   
org.cougaar.planning.ldm.asset   
org.cougaar.planning.ldm.lps   
org.cougaar.planning.plugin.legacy   
org.cougaar.planning.service   
 

Classes in org.cougaar.core.domain used by org.cougaar.core.domain
DelayedLPAction
          An action by a LogicProvider that is delayed until all the other LogicProviders have a chance to run.
Domain
          A domain provides problem-specific support for blackboard objects, such as an object Factory and LogicProviders to automate object behaviors and communicate with remote agents.
Factory
          A factory allows clients to create domain-specific object instances.
LogicProvider
          A logic provider performs the blackboard and message handling work of a Domain.
RootPlan
          The "root" plan provides blackboard access to Domain LogicProviders, including a view of all UniqueObjects on the blackboard.
SupportsDelayedLPActions
          A marker interface for Domains that handle DelayedLPActions.
XPlan
          An "xplan" is a marker interface for a domain-specific blackboard view that is shared between Domains through the XPlanService.
 

Classes in org.cougaar.core.domain used by org.cougaar.core.mobility.ldm
Domain
          A domain provides problem-specific support for blackboard objects, such as an object Factory and LogicProviders to automate object behaviors and communicate with remote agents.
DomainAdapter
          This component is an optional base class for Domain implementations.
Factory
          A factory allows clients to create domain-specific object instances.
 

Classes in org.cougaar.core.domain used by org.cougaar.core.relay
ABAChangeLogicProvider
          A LogicProvider that handles community membership changes.
EnvelopeLogicProvider
          A LogicProvider that handles blackboard transaction add/change/remove EnvelopeTuples.
LogicProvider
          A logic provider performs the blackboard and message handling work of a Domain.
MessageLogicProvider
          A LogicProvider that handles incoming Directive messages.
RestartLogicProvider
          A LogicProvider that handles agent restart reconciliation.
RootPlan
          The "root" plan provides blackboard access to Domain LogicProviders, including a view of all UniqueObjects on the blackboard.
 

Classes in org.cougaar.core.domain used by org.cougaar.core.service

          A factory allows clients to create domain-specific object instances.

          This component is an optional base class for Domain implementations.

XPlan
          An "xplan" is a marker interface for a domain-specific blackboard view that is shared between Domains through the XPlanService.
 

Classes in org.cougaar.core.domain used by org.cougaar.planning.ldm.asset
FactoryException
          A runtime exception thrown by a Factory.
